meta.title: Listing Logs
meta.description: View logs of your listing using this page.
meta.keywords: listing, log, listing logs, listing log

empty.title: No log entries yet.
empty.description: Log entries for this listing will appear here when created.

reorder.text: User <0>@{{userName}}</0> changed the order of this listing.

validate_success.text: Category rules have been checked by the system, and the listing successfully passed these rules. If active, the listing will be published.

validate_fail.text: Category rules have been checked by the system, and the listing failed to pass these rules. Any errors will be displayed below.

meta.title: Listing Details
meta.description: View details of your listing using this page.
meta.keywords: listing, detail, listing details, listing detail

enable.title: Publish Listing
enable.subtitle: Are you sure you want to publish your listing?
enable.text: Once published, your listing will be visible to the public. Make sure you are certain before publishing.
enable.label: Confirmation Text
enable.confirmation: To complete the publishing process, please type '{{text}}' in the box below.

disable.title: Disable Listing
disable.subtitle: Are you sure you want to disable your listing?
disable.text: When disabled, no one will be able to see your listing. Make sure you are certain before disabling.
disable.label: Confirmation Text
disable.confirmation: To complete the disabling process, please type '{{text}}' in the box below.

delete.title: Delete Listing
delete.subtitle: Are you sure you want to delete your listing?
delete.text: Deleting an listing is irreversible. Make sure you are certain before deleting.
delete.label: Confirmation Text

restore.title: Restore Listing
restore.subtitle: Are you sure you want to restore your listing?
restore.text: Restoring an listing is easily reversible. Make sure you are certain before restoring.
restore.label: Confirmation Text

meta.title: Create Listing
meta.description: Create a new listing using this page.
meta.keywords: listing, create, new, new listing, create listing

create.success: Your listing has been successfully created. If no issues are detected during category checks, it will be published.

meta.title: Edit Listing
meta.description: Edit your listing using this page.
meta.keywords: listing, edit, edit listing, edit my listing

edit.success: Your listing has been successfully updated. If no issues are detected during category checks, it will be published.

meta.title: My Ads
meta.description: Manage your ads using this page.
meta.keywords: my ads, manage my ads, view my ads

info.title: Listing Reordering
info.description: You can reorder your ads by dragging and dropping them.

empty.title: No Ads Found
empty.description: You haven't created any ads yet. Click the create listing button above to create a new listing.

ask.title: Autosaved Data Found
ask.description: Autosaved data has been found for this listing. Do you want to load this data?

verificationFailed.title: Verification Failed
verificationFailed.description: An error occurred during the verification of your listing. Please consult your administrator for details.

onLive.title: Live
onLive.description: Your listing is currently live and visible to everyone.

deleted.title: Deleted
deleted.description: Deleted listing. Go to the details page to republish.

active.title: Active
active.description: Your listing is active and ready for publication.

passive.title: Disabled
passive.description: Your listing is disabled and not ready for publication.

meta.title: Meta Information
meta.subtitle: Enter meta information for your listing in this section.

images.title: Listing Images
images.subtitle: Upload images for your listing in this section.

error.title: Title Required
error.description: To upload an image, you must enter a title with at least 5 characters.

currency.title: Currency
currency.subtitle: Specify the currency for your listing in this section.

alert.title: Inflation Warning
alert.description: When determining the currency for your listing, please consider inflation. Due to potential inflation differences in selecting Turkish Lira, you may incur losses as payments may be delayed. Therefore, we recommend choosing Euro or Dollar.

currency.label: Currency

calendar.title: Calendar & Pricing
calendar.subtitle: Set the calendar and pricing for your listing in this section.

info.title: Price Range Tip
info.description: You can set different prices for specific date ranges using the fields below.
info.example: For example, 100 ₺ from June 1 - June 30, 200 ₺ from July 1 - July 31, and so on.
info.float: Use periods for decimal numbers. For example, 100.50 ₺.

error.startDateGreaterThanEndDate: Start date cannot be greater than end date.
error.endDateLessThanNow: End date cannot be less than the current date.
error.startDateLessThanNow: Start date cannot be less than the current date.
error.unique: At least one of the days in this date range has already been added.
error.priceNaN: The price field is invalid. It should be in the format: 10,000 (ten thousand ₺) or 10,000.50 (ten thousand ₺ 50 kuruş), etc.
error.priceNegative: The price field cannot be negative.

category.title: Category Information
category.subtitle: Enter category information for your listing in this section.

category-alerts.title: Category Alerts
category-alerts.subtitle: Enter category alerts for your listing in this section.

category-rules.title: Category Rules
category-rules.subtitle: Please read and accept the category rules.

location.title: Listing Location
location.subtitle: Specify the location for your listing in this section.

isStrict.title: Exact Location
isStrict.description: Is the location of this listing exact?

location.error: Location selection failed. Please try again.
location.notSupported: Your browser does not support location selection.

info.title: Map Tip
info.description: Click on the map to select a location. The blue marker indicates the location. Drag the marker to change the location.
info.descriptionTwo: Note: City and District are estimated location information that can be changed using manual input. If incorrect, you can manually change the city and district information.

validation.title: Custom Rules
validation.subtitle: Enter custom rules for your listing in this section.

onlyFamily.title: Family Only
onlyFamily.description: This listing is exclusive to families. Non-family members cannot reserve this listing.

noPet.title: No Pets
noPet.description: This listing does not accept pets.

noSmoke.title: No Smoking
noSmoke.description: People reserving this listing cannot smoke during the reservation period.

noAlcohol.title: No Alcohol
noAlcohol.description: People reserving this listing cannot consume alcohol during the reservation period.

noParty.title: No Parties
noParty.description: People reserving this listing cannot organize parties here.

noUnmarried.title: No Unmarried Individuals
noUnmarried.description: People reserving this listing must be married.

noGuest.title: No Guests
noGuest.description: People reserving this listing cannot accept guests.
